ing: 1 (16 ounce) container small curd cottage cheese
1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping (such as Cool WhipÂ®), thawed
1 (3 ounce) package lime-flavored gelatin mix (such as Jell-OÂ®)
des:
"This is the one Jell-OÂ® salad I think of when the holidays roll around. There is always room

ins: Stir pineapple, cottage cheese, and whipped topping together in a bowl; sprinkle gelatin mix over the top and stir until well-mixed. Refrigerate until chilled and set, at least 2 hours.
